Uses of Class
com.github.git24j.core.Index

    • Uses of Index in com.github.git24j.core

      Methods in com.github.git24j.core that return Index 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Index Merge.commits(Repository repo, Commit ourCommit, Commit theirCommit, Merge.Options opts)
      Merge two commits, producing a `git_index` that reflects the result of the merge.
      Index Repository.index()
      Get the Index file for this repository.
      Index Rebase.inmemoryIndex()
      Gets the index produced by the last operation, which is the result of `git_rebase_next` and which will be committed by the next invocation of `git_rebase_commit`.
      static Index Index.open(String indexPath)
      Create a new bare Git index object as a memory representation of the Git index file in 'indexPath', without a repository to back it.
      static Index Merge.trees(Repository repo, Tree ancestorTree, Tree ourTree, Tree theirTree, Merge.Options opts)
      Merge two trees, producing a `git_index` that reflects the result of the merge.

      Get an entry to one of the entries in the index

      Get one of the entries in the index that matches the given path
      static int Checkout.index(Repository repo, Index index, Checkout.Options opts)
      Updates files in the working tree to match the content of the index.
      static Diff Diff.indexToIndex(Repository repo, Index oldIndex, Index newIndex, Diff.Options opts)
      Create a diff with the difference between two index objects.
      static Diff Diff.indexToWorkdir(Repository repo, Index index, Diff.Options opts)
      Create a diff between the repository index and the workdir directory.
      void Checkout.Options.setBaselineIndex(Index baselineIndex) 
      static Diff Diff.treeToIndex(Repository repo, Tree oldTree, Index index, Diff.Options opts)
